ShortDescription.Value: No Pollution will stop/remove all pollution from the map

Publish.LongDescription:
# No Pollution This mod will stop pollution being produced on the map and remove existing Ground, Air, Noise pollution.
## Functionality This mod will stop noise pollution, ground pollution, air pollution, groundwater pollution. Removing water pollution is not implemented yet but will be added in the future.
### Small disclaimer It will remove Ground, Air, Noise pollution and stop. Will stop other pollution types.
## Roadmap * More pollution types for the reset button * Pollution sliders for each type of pollution * Master Pollution slider
